Symbol.Script_1D:
EPS = 0.0001 show_type=0 flag_del = 0 flag_add = 1
filter_type = 0 : success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-km", "filter_type", filter_type) if filter_type<EPS then goto "end_show" space = " " : var = tip_konstr : gosub "trim_space" : tip_konstr = var space = " " : var = tip_konstr : gosub "trim_space" : tip_konstr = var if tip_konstr = " " or strlen(tip_konstr)=0 then goto "end_show"
tip_konstr = STRTOLOWER(tip_konstr) dim arr[]
dim hide_type_clear[] : hide_type_clear[1] = "" success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-km", "hide_type_clear", hide_type_clear) if hide_type_clear[1] = "*" or hide_type_clear[1] = " " or strlen(hide_type_clear[1])=0 then flag_del = 0 else arr = hide_type_clear : gosub "check_show" : flag_del = flag endif
if not(flag_del) then dim show_type_clear[] : show_type_clear[1] = "*" success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-km", "show_type_clear", show_type_clear) if show_type_clear[1] = "*" or show_type_clear[1] = " " or strlen(show_type_clear[1])=0 then flag_add = 1 else arr = show_type_clear : gosub "check_show" : flag_add = flag endif endif
"end_show": show_type=flag_add and not(flag_del) exit show_type
"check_show": flag = 0 for i=1 to vardim1(arr) if arr[i] = "*" then flag = 1 if not(flag) then if arr[i] = tip_konstr then flag = 1 else if strstr(arr[i],"*")>0 then first_expr = (STRSUB(arr[i], 1, 1) = "*") !Начинается с * end_expr = (STRSUB(arr[i], STRLEN(arr[i]), 1) = "*") !Заканчивается на * tarr = arr[i] if first_expr then tarr = STRSUB(tarr, 2, STRLEN(tarr)) if end_expr then tarr = STRSUB(tarr, 1, STRLEN(tarr)-1) if first_expr and end_expr then flag = (STRSTR(tip_konstr, tarr)>0) else ttip_konstr = "*" if first_expr then ttip_konstr = STRSUB(tip_konstr, 2, STRLEN(tarr)) if end_expr then ttip_konstr = STRSUB(tip_konstr, 1, STRLEN(tarr)) flag = (ttip_konstr = tarr) endif endif endif endif if flag then i=vardim1(arr) next i return
"trim_space": if vartype(var) = 2 then DO is_trim = 0 lvar = strlen(var) is_first_space = (strstr(STRSUB (var, 1, 1),space)>0) is_end_space = (strstr(STRSUB (var, lvar, 1),space)>0) if is_first_space then var = STRSUB (var, 2, lvar-1) lvar = strlen(var) endif if is_end_space then var = STRSUB (var, 1, lvar-1) is_trim = is_first_space + is_end_space WHILE is_trim <> 0 endif return
